title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-827)
description: On December 10, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)   versions prior to 18.6.2, 18.5.4 and 18.4.6
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)   versions prior to 18.6.2, 18.5.4 and 18.4.6
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
